name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Zone
List
description: Zone::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Zone
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more zones that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Zone
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more zones that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Zone
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of zones.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns

zones = dns.zones
if zones.next?
  next_zones = zones.next
end

require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns

zones = dns.zones
if zones.next?
  next_zones = zones.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Zone
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all zones by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each zone, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all zones are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each zone by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zones = dns.zones

zones.all do |zone|
  puts zone.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zones = dns.zones

all_names = zones.all.map do |zone|
  zone.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zones = dns.zones

zones.all(request_limit: 10) do |zone|
  puts zone.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all zones. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each zone.
